code: @Test public void testThreadsCoreAndMaxPoolKeepAliveTime() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").threads(5, 10).keepAliveTime(10).timeUnit(TimeUnit.SECONDS).to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").threads(5, 10).keepAliveTime(10).timeUnit(TimeUnit.SECONDS).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
